content: work single_crochet along lower edge and back of neck holding edge it to fit 1 single_crochet per round on front of cap and join two together on transition to back of cap the rest on the back is one stitch into one stitch about 9 inches fasten_off finishing run the 3/4­inch ribbon under and over the shells of 1st row on front edge make the ends even for ties and tack ribbon at each side of cap it is actually pictured second row in this gives a little soft ruffle around the edge sew on rosettes i also suggest fray checking all ribbon raw edges so it can easily go through in the wash without worry of fraying; or you can fold edges of ribbon to a point and stitch down instead to do the same
